戶口.definition: population (counted as number of households for census or taxation); registered residence; residence permit; (in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account

戶口制.definition: PRC system of compulsory registration of households

戶口本.definition: household register; household registration booklet; residence certificate

戶告人曉.definition: to make known to every household (idiom); to disseminate widely; to shout from the rooftops

戶型.definition: configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)

戶樞不蠹.definition: lit. a door hinge never becomes worm-eaten; constant activity prevents decay (idiom)

戶部.definition: Ministry of Revenue in imperial China

戶部尚書.definition: Minister of Revenue (from the Han dynasty onwards)

戶限為穿.definition: to have an endless stream of visitors (idiom)
